deposits 0.0.1.043
  • Reference

    • Metadata and Data Entities

    depositsClient

    depositsClient.Rd

    R6 class for constructing deposits queries

    Value

    a depositsClient class (R6 class)

    Public fields

    name

    (character) of deposits server

    url

    (character) list of fragments

    headers

    list of named headers

    schema

    holds schema

    result

    holds result from http request

    Methods

    Public methods

    • depositsClient$new()

    • depositsClient$print()

    • depositsClient$ping()

    Method new()

    Create a new depositsClient object

    Usage

    depositsClient$new(name, headers = NULL)

    Arguments

    name

    (character) of a deposits service (see deposits_services).

    headers

    Any acceptable headers. See examples

    Returns

    A new depositsClient object

    Method print()

    print method for the depositsClient class

    Usage

    depositsClient$print(x, ...)

    Arguments

    x

    self

    ...

    ignored

    Method ping()

    ping a deposits server

    Usage

    depositsClient$ping(...)

    Arguments

    ...

    curl options passed on to crul::verb-HEAD

    Returns

    TRUE if successful response, FALSE otherwise

    Examples

    if (FALSE) {
# make a client
token <- Sys.getenv("ZENODO_TOKEN")
cli <- depositsClient$new(
    name = "figshare"
)

# methods
## ping - hopefully you get TRUE
cli$ping()

}
